name: Hidden Tombs
description:
Prepare for Hidden Tombs!

Hidden Tombs  is a challenging fun memory game, where you search for treasure and ancient artifacts.

Put your memory to the test, and as you progress further, the enemies will challenge you more and more. Search for gems and artifacts, collecting as much as you can, while avoiding the enemies. 

Find the exit, and escape with your treasures before time ends, and advance to the next stage. Be careful on your journey, one wrong move and the skulls will stop you in your tracks!

Features:

  • Achievements for unlocking all 12 hidden artifacts
  • Online Leader Boards to compete your scores against others
  • Continue your game to keep your score and stage

This game was created by Ultra Line Software and in collaboration with RP-Interactive. For more information, visit UltraLineSoftware & RP-Interactive.

Thank you for your continued support! -ULS
